unnormalised: Campus hiring initiatives like IIT Bombay's placement season are crucial for sourcing fresh talent. Recruitment drives in colleges like Delhi University offer cost-effective solutions for entry-level positions. We should focus on tier 2 and 3 institutions in UP and Bihar as well. Perhaps a "3 Idiots" inspired approach could reduce interview pressure. Competitive salary packages starting from Rs. 4 Lakhs are a must to attract top graduates. Timely onboarding and effective training are also important factors for retention.
